Perceptor/Perceptor's team::

Perceptor and his team moved where they belived that was a safe 
place. 
"Perceptor to Drillbit... Do you copy?" said the blind-bot "I arrived 
at the place where is safe... I'll open my signal in your frecuency 
for your followers..."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream/Bludgeon/Obsidian:::
> 
> ::Starscream hears Drillbit's transmission::
> Starscream: Alright guys, we have to find the new base. look for a 
collapsed 
> tunnel.
> ::They look for awhile and eventually find it::
> Obsidian: Alright, heres the stumper, how do we dig through? Im 
made for the 
> sky.
> Starscream: My Octopus mode wouldnt help.
> Bludgeon: Hey guys! Im a Rhino with tank treads! I could get us 
throguh here 
> in no time!
> ::Bludgeon is about to set to work digging, but then then Drillbits 
new 
> transmission comes in::
> Starscream: Pull out Bludgeon. New orders, we wait for coordinates 
of a new 
> entrance.
> ::Bludgeon pulls out of the hole and they all wait.
